name: Daryna Darii
title: Software Engineer & Product Analyst
about: I'm a developer passionate about creating products that combine AI, design, and business logic. With experience in startups, SaaS, and mobile apps, I bring both technical execution and product strategy to every project.

experience.description: Developed mobile applications using React Native, implemented real-time features with Firebase, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centric solutions.
Led technical strategy and product development for a SaaS platform. Built scalable architecture, managed development team, and drove product-market fit through data-driven iterations.
Analyzed user behavior and product metrics to drive feature development. Created dashboards, conducted A/B tests, and collaborated with engineering teams to optimize product performance.

projects.name: Yeego
projects.description: AI-powered networking platform that connects professionals based on interests and goals using intelligent matching algorithms.

projects.name: HODIMO
projects.description: Restaurant discovery app with smart filters, personalized recommendations, and exclusive discount rewards. Find dining spots by cuisine, vibe, and location.

projects.name: OutWithStrangers
projects.description: Django-based social application that facilitates meaningful connections through organized group activities and events.

projects.name: WhoRiddle
projects.description: Cross-platform riddle game with competitive leaderboards and reward system. Available on Google Play and App Store.

projects.name: FinanceBro
projects.description: Personal finance tracker built with JavaFX featuring budget management, expense tracking, and financial insights visualization.
